Subscription.Description: Windows Update Installation Events, New System Filter Drivers, and Service Errors.
Subscription.Query: <QueryList> <!-- Inspired by Microsoft Documentation and/or IADGOV --> <Query Id="0" > <!-- Windows Update Service Errors --> <Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-WindowsUpdateClient/Operational">*[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-WindowsUpdateClient'] and Level=2 and (EventID=19 or EventID=20 or EventID=24 or EventID=25 or EventID=31 or EventID=34 or EventID=35)]]</Select> <!-- Hotpatching Errors --> <Select Path="Setup">*[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-Servicing'] and Level=0 and EventID=1009]]</Select> </Query> </QueryList>
